1.title: Welcome to Trustchain
1.description: TrustChain utilizes ZK Smart NFC for an advanced anti-counterfeiting protocol

2.title: Find NFC Tag
2.description: Find the NFC Tag on the product. It is usually on the label of the product

3.title: Scan Tag
3.description: Scan the tag by bringing your phone closer for quick and easy authentication

4.title: Verify Product
4.description: Verify a product's authenticity through a Blockchain system.

authentication.note: By completing the registration process, you agree to the applicable

scan.title: Start to Scan
scan.description: Start immediately by tapping the 'Scan' button and reading the NFC tag associated to a product
scan.hold: Hold your device near the NFC Tag

write.title: Title
write.url: URL to be Embedded in Tag
write.successDescription: You have successfully written your NFC Tags, you can try to scan

myTags.emptyDescription: Please write your NFC Tags to see this feature

history.emptyDescription: Scan NFC Tags to see this feature

profileNotAuthenticated.title: You are not yet authenticated
